mapper.update: update d_casualties set casualtiesid=casualtiesid ,occurtime=#{occurtime} ,occurarea=#{occurarea} ,casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} ,responsibility=#{responsibility} ,materialcause=#{materialcause} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where casualtiesid=#{casualtiesid}

update d_casualties set casualtiesid=casualtiesid ,occurtime=#{occurtime} ,occurarea=#{occurarea} ,casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} ,responsibility=#{responsibility} ,materialcause=#{materialcause} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} where 1=1 and casualtiesid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and casualtiesid =#{Where_Id} and casualtiesid=#{Where_casualtiesid} and occurtime=#{Where_occurtime} and occurarea=#{Where_occurarea} and casualtiestypeid=#{Where_casualtiestypeid} and responsibility=#{Where_responsibility} and materialcause=#{Where_materialcause} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid}
mapper.select: select t.casualtiesid "casualtiesid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.materialcause "materialcause", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid" from d_casualties t where casualtiesid=#{casualtiesid}

select t.casualtiesid "casualtiesid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.materialcause "materialcause", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid" from d_casualties t where 1=1 and t.casualtiesid=#{casualtiesid} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.materialcause=#{materialcause} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid}

select t.casualtiesid "casualtiesid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.materialcause "materialcause", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid" from d_casualties t where 1=1 and t.casualtiesid=#{casualtiesid} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.materialcause=#{materialcause} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid}
mapper.delete: delete from d_casualties where 1=1 and casualtiesid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and casualtiesid =#{Where_Id} and casualtiesid=#{Where_casualtiesid} and occurtime=#{Where_occurtime} and occurarea=#{Where_occurarea} and casualtiestypeid=#{Where_casualtiestypeid} and responsibility=#{Where_responsibility} and materialcause=#{Where_materialcause} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid}
mapper.select: select t.casualtiesid "casualtiesid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.occurarea "occurarea", t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.materialcause "materialcause", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid" from d_casualties t where 1=1 and t.casualtiesid=#{casualtiesid} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.materialcause=#{materialcause} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid}

select count(*) from d_casualties t where 1=1 and t.casualtiesid=#{casualtiesid} and t.casualtiesid!=#{NoId} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.occurarea=#{occurarea} and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.materialcause=#{materialcause} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid}
